'''Nordagand''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

An elderly woman handing out meals at the Temple of Gaun for the Dawnstars.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [The Lighted Path](/theLightedPath/)
|none            = 
|other           = * With [Edér](/eder/) in the party, during [The Lighted Path](/theLightedPath/) she'll say to him: "Here for a meal? Just get in line, dear, ain't no trick to it."
}}

## =Quests

=
* [The Lighted Path](/theLightedPath/): She points Eder in Elafa's direction at [Hasongo](/hasongo/).
[Category:The Sacred Stair characters](/categoryTheSacredStairCharacters/)
[Category:Temple of Gaun characters](/categoryTempleOfGaunCharacters/)
